name: Radiant Aegis
description: You call forth a mantle of holy light around a creature within a short (10 unit) distance. Until the start of your next turn, the first attack that hits the warded creature has its damage reduced by 4 and cannot score a critical hit. If the attack misses, the creature instead regains 1 resolve.
charge: If you charge this spell while expending a Vial of Holy Water, the aegis lasts for 1 minute without further concentration. At the start of each of the target's turns, the protection refreshes until it has reduced damage once.
